snippet: Bethanie Mattek-Sands and Mardy Fish fall out of contention for the title at the Hopman Cup.
abstract: Bethanie Mattek-Sands and Mardy Fish fall out of contention for the title at the Hopman Cup.
lead_paragraph: PERTH, Australia--The fourth-seeded American contingent of Bethanie Mattek-Sands and highest-ranked American male Mardy Fish was the first team in Group A to be mathematically eliminated from qualifying for the final of the Hyundai Hopman Cup, winning only one match out of their first six to fall out of contention for the title.

headline.main: At Hopman, Americans Are Eliminated Early
